events.text: Yeah…! Sure I do. You’re the champion––the old champion. You’re Buddy the… wolf. Don’ you reckernize me? It’s me! Saggy T!
Didn’t expect to see you here, Saggy. Shouldn’t you be at the arena? They need a bouncer at the back door with a big match coming up.

Yer right. Yer always right. Buddy the Wolv’rine. What a guy. 
Say, wasn’t the boss talking about’cha today? An’ the Dippers, too. Sumthin’ we was all supposed’a do if we saw youse…

events.question: Quickly buy Saggy T a drink?

events.text: Have a beer, Saggy. On me.

Say! Buddy th’ Wolv’rine. Yer a helluva guy. Wolf. Whatever.
 Wha’ was I talkin’ bout? Ah, fuggedaboutit. Jus’ one more drink an’ I’ll head down t’ th’ arena. 
They’re gonna need a bouncer at th’ back door wid th’ big match comin’ up an’ all, y’know.
Would you look at the time! Gotta run. See you around, Saggy.
Ah, fuggedaboutit. See ya ‘round….what was yer name, again?
